scripts.test: SET TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json&& nyc mocha --ui bdd --timeout 30000 --colors --exit -r ts-node/register test/**/*-test.ts&& nyc report --reporter=html --report-dir coverage
scripts.dist:dev: tsc -p tsconfig.json --removeComments false --listFiles false --sourceMap false --inlineSourceMap true --inlineSources true --listEmittedFiles false --declaration true && cp "package.json" "dist/" && cp "src/swagger.json" "dist/"
scripts.dist:prod: tsc -p tsconfig.json --removeComments false --listFiles false --sourceMap false --inlineSourceMap false --inlineSources false --listEmittedFiles false --declaration true && cp "package.json" "dist/" && cp "src/swagger.json" "dist/"
